## Checklist

<!-- Mark items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any console.log statements and debug code

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated the README (if needed)
- [ ] I have added/updated comments in the code
- [ ] I have updated relevant TypeScript interfaces/types

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested the changes in development environment
- [ ] I have tested the build process (`npm run build`)

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have checked for any dependency updates required
- [ ] I have run `npm audit` and resolved any security issues
- [ ] I have verified all dependencies are compatible

### Git Hygiene

- [ ] My commits follow the Conventional Commits specification
- [ ] I have rebased my branch on the latest main
- [ ] I have resolved any merge conflicts
- [ ] My branch is up to date with main
